verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> The LORD <WH3068> is my shepherd; <WH7462> I shall not want. <WH2637>
He makes me to lie <WH7257> down <WH7257> in green <WH1877> pastures: <WH4999> he leads <WH5095> me beside <WH5921> the still <WH4496> waters. <WH4325>
He restores <WH7725> my soul: <WH5315> he leads <WH5095> me in the paths <WH4570> of righteousness <WH6664> for his name's <WH8034> sake. <WH4616>

Yes, <WH1571> though <WH3588> I walk <WH3212> through the valley <WH1516> of the shadow <WH6757> of death, <WH6757> I will fear <WH3372> no <WH3808> evil: <WH7451> for you are with me; your rod <WH7626> and your staff <WH4938> they comfort <WH5162> me.
You prepare <WH6186> a table <WH7979> before <WH6440> me in the presence <WH5048> of my enemies: <WH6887> you anoint <WH1878> my head <WH7218> with oil; <WH8081> my cup <WH3563> runs <WH7310> over.

Surely <WH389> goodness <WH2896> and mercy <WH2617> shall follow <WH7291> me all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of my life: <WH2416> and I will dwell <WH3427> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> for ever. <WH753> <WH3117>
